languages.text: Whenever the wearer performs a single-target attack with a two-handed {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, that attack deals +{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer performs a single-target attack with a two-handed melee weapon, that attack deals +<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> damage.

Whenever the wearer performs a single-target attack with a two-handed {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, that attack deals +<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

Whenever the wearer performs a single-target attack with a two-handed {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, that attack deals +{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者使用双手{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器进行攻击时，此次攻击额外造成{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a single-target attack with a two-handed {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, that attack deals +{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用双手近战武器进行攻击，且没有造成暴击时，{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}此次攻击额外造成<u>（3×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>点伤害。
当装备者使用双手{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器进行攻击时，此次攻击额外造成{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。

languages.text: Когда персонаж совершает одиночную атаку двуручным {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашным{/g} оружием, эта атака наносит +{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs an attack with a two-handed melee weapon and it is not a critical hit, that attack deals +<u>(3 × STR bonus)</u> damage.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж совершает некритическое попадание двуручным рукопашным оружием, атака наносит +<u>(3 × бонус СИЛ)</u> урона дополнительно.
Когда персонаж совершает некритическое попадание двуручным рукопашным оружием, атака наносит +<u>(3 × бонус СИЛ)</u> урона дополнительно.

Когда персонаж совершает одиночную атаку двуручным {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашным{/g} оружием, эта атака наносит +{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно.

languages.text: 使用者が両手持ちの{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器で、1体のターゲットに攻撃するたび、その攻撃が+{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a single-target attack with a two-handed {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, that attack deals +{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が両手持ちの近接武器で攻撃を行い、クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}でない場合、その攻撃の与ダメージが<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>増える。
使用者が両手持ちの{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器で、1体のターゲットに攻撃するたび、その攻撃が+{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador realiza un ataque de un objetivo con un arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} a dos manos, el ataque inflige +{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a single-target attack with a two-handed {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, that attack deals +{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador realiza un ataque con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo a dos manos y no es un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico, este ataque aplica +<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g}</u> por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g}) de daño.

Cada vez que el portador realiza un ataque de un objetivo con un arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} a dos manos, el ataque inflige +{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.

languages.text: Immer wenn der Träger einen Einzelzielangriff mit einer zweihändigen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-Waffe ausführt, verursacht dieser Angriff +{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a single-target attack with a two-handed {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, that attack deals +{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger einen Angriff mit einer zweihändigen Nahkampfwaffe ausführt und es kein kritischer {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} ist, verursacht dieser Angriff +<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> Schaden.

Immer wenn der Träger einen Einzelzielangriff mit einer zweihändigen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-Waffe ausführt, verursacht dieser Angriff +{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une attaque à cible unique à l'aide d'une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} à deux mains, cette attaque inflige +{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a single-target attack with a two-handed {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, that attack deals +{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur mène une attaque à l'aide d'une arme de mêlée à deux mains et qu'aucun {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique n'est porté, cette attaque inflige +<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g})</u> points de dégâts.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur mène une attaque à l'aide d'une arme de mêlée à deux mains et qu'aucun {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique n'est porté, cette attaque inflige +<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g})</u> points de dégâts.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une attaque à cible unique à l'aide d'une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} à deux mains, cette attaque inflige +{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
